entry.title: Aeneas transforms how historians connect the past
entry.summary: We’re publishing a paper in Nature introducing Aeneas, the first AI model for contextualizing ancient inscriptions. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now ready for scaled production use
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite, previously in preview, is now stable and generally available. This cost-efficient model provides high quality in a small size, and includes 2.5 family features like a 1 million-token context window and multimodality. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Advanced version of Gemini with Deep Think officially achieves gold-medal standard at the International Mathematical Olympiad
entry.summary: Our advanced model officially achieved a gold-medal level performance on problems from the International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO), the world’s most prestigious competition for young mathematicians. It earned a total of 35 points by perfectly solving five out of the six problems. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Exploring the context of online images with Backstory
entry.summary: New experimental AI tool helps people explore the context and origin of images seen online. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AlphaGenome: AI for better understanding the genome
entry.summary: Introducing a new, unifying DNA sequence model that advances regulatory variant-effect prediction and promises to shed new light on genome function — now available via API. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini Robotics On-Device brings AI to local robotic devices
entry.summary: We’re introducing an efficient, on-device robotics model with general-purpose dexterity and fast task adaptation. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini 2.5: Updates to our family of thinking models
entry.summary: Explore the latest Gemini 2.5 model updates with enhanced performance and accuracy: Gemini 2.5 Pro now stable, Flash generally available, and the new Flash-Lite in preview. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: We’re expanding our Gemini 2.5 family of models
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro are now generally available, and we’re introducing 2.5 Flash-Lite, our most cost-efficient and fastest 2.5 model yet. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Behind “ANCESTRA”: combining Veo with live-action filmmaking
entry.summary: We partnered with Darren Aronofsky, Eliza McNitt and a team of more than 200 people to make a film using Veo and live-action filmmaking. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: How we're supporting better tropical cyclone prediction with AI
entry.summary: We’re launching Weather Lab, featuring our experimental cyclone predictions, and we’re partnering with the U.S. National Hurricane Center to support their forecasts and warnings this cyclone season. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Advanced audio dialog and generation with Gemini 2.5
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 has new capabilities in AI-powered audio dialog and generation. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini 2.5: Our most intelligent models are getting even better
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Pro continues to be loved by developers as the best model for coding, and 2.5 Flash is getting even better with a new update. We’re bringing new capabilities to our models, including Deep Think, an experimental enhanced reasoning mode for 2.5 Pro. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Announcing Gemma 3n preview: Powerful, efficient, mobile-first AI
entry.summary: Gemma 3n is a cutting-edge open model designed for fast, multimodal AI on devices, featuring optimized performance, unique flexibility with a 2-in-1 model, and expanded multimodal understanding with audio, empowering developers to build live, interactive applications and sophisticated audio-centric experiences. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: SynthID Detector — a new portal to help identify AI-generated content
entry.summary: Learn about the new SynthID Detector portal we announced at I/O to help people understand how the content they see online was generated. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Fuel your creativity with new generative media models and tools
entry.summary: Introducing Veo 3 and Imagen 4, and a new tool for filmmaking called Flow. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Advancing Gemini's security safeguards
entry.summary: We’ve made Gemini 2.5 our most secure model family to date. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Our vision for building a universal AI assistant
entry.summary: We’re extending Gemini to become a world model that can make plans and imagine new experiences by simulating aspects of the world. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
entry.summary: New AI agent evolves algorithms for math and practical applications in computing by combining the creativity of large language models with automated evaluators | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview: even better coding performance
entry.summary: We’ve seen developers doing amazing things with Gemini 2.5 Pro, so we decided to release an updated version a couple of weeks early to get into developers hands sooner. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Build rich, interactive web apps with an updated Gemini 2.5 Pro
entry.summary: Our updated version of Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview has improved capabilities for coding. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Music AI Sandbox, now with new features and broader access
entry.summary: Helping music professionals explore the potential of generative AI | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Introducing Gemini 2.5 Flash
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash is our first fully hybrid reasoning model, giving developers the ability to turn thinking on or off. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Generate videos in Gemini and Whisk with Veo 2
entry.summary: Transform text-based prompts into high-resolution eight-second videos in Gemini Advanced and use Whisk Animate to turn images into eight-second animated clips. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: DolphinGemma: How Google AI is helping decode dolphin communication
entry.summary: DolphinGemma, a large language model developed by Google, is helping scientists study how dolphins communicate — and hopefully find out what they're saying, too. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Taking a responsible path to AGI
entry.summary: We’re exploring the frontiers of AGI, prioritizing technical safety, proactive risk assessment, and collaboration with the AI community. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Evaluating potential cybersecurity threats of advanced AI
entry.summary: Our framework enables cybersecurity experts to identify which defenses are necessary—and how to prioritize them | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini 2.5: Our most intelligent AI model
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 is our most intelligent AI model, now with thinking built in. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini Robotics brings AI into the physical world
entry.summary: Introducing Gemini Robotics and Gemini Robotics-ER, AI models designed for robots to understand, act and react to the physical world. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Experiment with Gemini 2.0 Flash native image generation
entry.summary: Native image output is available in Gemini 2.0 Flash for developers to experiment with in Google AI Studio and the Gemini API. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Introducing Gemma 3
entry.summary: The most capable model you can run on a single GPU or TPU. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Start building with Gemini 2.0 Flash and Flash-Lite
entry.summary: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite is now generally available in the Gemini API for production use in Google AI Studio and for enterprise customers on Vertex AI | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini 2.0 is now available to everyone
entry.summary: We’re announcing new updates to Gemini 2.0 Flash, plus introducing Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite and Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Updating the Frontier Safety Framework
entry.summary: Our next iteration of the FSF sets out stronger security protocols on the path to AGI | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: FACTS Grounding: A new benchmark for evaluating the factuality of large language models
entry.summary: Our comprehensive benchmark and online leaderboard offer a much-needed measure of how accurately LLMs ground their responses in provided source material and avoid hallucinations | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: State-of-the-art video and image generation with Veo 2 and Imagen 3
entry.summary: We’re rolling out a new, state-of-the-art video model, Veo 2, and updates to Imagen 3. Plus, check out our new experiment, Whisk. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Introducing Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era
entry.summary: Today, we’re announcing Gemini 2.0, our most capable multimodal AI model yet. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Google DeepMind at NeurIPS 2024
entry.summary: Advancing adaptive AI agents, empowering 3D scene creation, and innovating LLM training for a smarter, safer future | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: GenCast predicts weather and the risks of extreme conditions with state-of-the-art accuracy
entry.summary: New AI model advances the prediction of weather uncertainties and risks, delivering faster, more accurate forecasts up to 15 days ahead | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Genie 2: A large-scale foundation world model
entry.summary: Generating unlimited diverse training environments for future general agents | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
entry.summary: Our new AI system accurately identifies errors inside quantum computers, helping to make this new technology more reliable. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: The AI for Science Forum: A new era of discovery
entry.summary: The AI Science Forum highlights AI's present and potential role in revolutionizing scientific discovery and solving global challenges, emphasizing collaboration between the scientific community, policymakers, and industry leaders. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Pushing the frontiers of audio generation
entry.summary: Our pioneering speech generation technologies are helping people around the world interact with more natural, conversational and intuitive digital assistants and AI tools. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: New generative AI tools open the doors of music creation
entry.summary: Our latest AI music technologies are now available in MusicFX DJ, Music AI Sandbox and YouTube Shorts | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Demis Hassabis & John Jumper awarded Nobel Prize in Chemistry
entry.summary: The award recognizes their work developing AlphaFold, a groundbreaking AI system that predicts the 3D structure of proteins from their amino acid sequences. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: How AlphaChip transformed computer chip design
entry.summary: Our AI method has accelerated and optimized chip design, and its superhuman chip layouts are used in hardware around the world. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Updated production-ready Gemini models, reduced 1.5 Pro pricing, increased rate limits, and more
entry.summary: We’re releasing two updated production-ready Gemini models | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Empowering YouTube creators with generative AI
entry.summary: New video generation technology in YouTube Shorts will help millions of people realize their creative vision | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Our latest advances in robot dexterity
entry.summary: Two new AI systems, ALOHA Unleashed and DemoStart, help robots learn to perform complex tasks that require dexterous movement | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
entry.summary: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: FermiNet: Quantum physics and chemistry from first principles
entry.summary: Using deep learning to solve fundamental problems in computational quantum chemistry and explore how matter interacts with light | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Mapping the misuse of generative AI
entry.summary: New research analyzes the misuse of multimodal generative AI today, in order to help build safer and more responsible technologies. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemma Scope: helping the safety community shed light on the inner workings of language models
entry.summary: Announcing a comprehensive, open suite of sparse autoencoders for language model interpretability. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AI achieves silver-medal standard solving International Mathematical Olympiad problems
entry.summary: Breakthrough models AlphaProof and AlphaGeometry 2 solve advanced reasoning problems in mathematics | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: Exploring AGI, the challenges of scaling and the future of multimodal generative AI | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: Video-to-audio research uses video pixels and text prompts to generate rich soundtracks | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: How summits in Seoul, France and beyond can galvanize international cooperation on frontier AI safety | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Introducing the Frontier Safety Framework
entry.summary: Our approach to analyzing and mitigating future risks posed by advanced AI models | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Gemini breaks new ground: a faster model, longer context and AI agents
entry.summary: We’re introducing a series of updates across the Gemini family of models, including the new 1.5 Flash, our lightweight model for speed and efficiency, and Project Astra, our vision for the future of AI assistants. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: New generative media models and tools, built with and for creators
entry.summary: We’re introducing Veo, our most capable model for generating high-definition video, and Imagen 3, our highest quality text-to-image model. We’re also sharing new demo recordings created with our Music AI Sandbox. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Watermarking AI-generated text and video with SynthID
entry.summary: Announcing our novel watermarking method for AI-generated text and video, and how we’re bringing SynthID to key Google products | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AlphaFold 3 predicts the structure and interactions of all of life’s molecules
entry.summary: Introducing a new AI model developed by Google DeepMind and Isomorphic Labs. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: Developing next-gen AI agents, exploring new modalities, and pioneering foundational learning | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: TacticAI: an AI assistant for football tactics
entry.summary: As part of our multi-year collaboration with Liverpool FC, we develop a full AI system that can advise coaches on corner kicks | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: A generalist AI agent for 3D virtual environments
entry.summary: Introducing SIMA, a Scalable Instructable Multiworld Agent | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: Gemma is built for responsible AI development from the same research and technology used to create Gemini models. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Our next-generation model: Gemini 1.5
entry.summary: The model delivers dramatically enhanced performance, with a breakthrough in long-context understanding across modalities. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: We're bringing Gemini to more Google products | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.summary: Advancing AI reasoning in mathematics | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Shaping the future of advanced robotics
entry.summary: Introducing AutoRT, SARA-RT, and RT-Trajectory | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Images altered to trick machine vision can influence humans too
entry.summary: In a series of experiments published in Nature Communications, we found evidence that human judgments are indeed systematically influenced by adversarial perturbations. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: 2023: A Year of Groundbreaking Advances in AI and Computing
entry.summary: This has been a year of incredible progress in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) research and its practical applications. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: FunSearch: Making new discoveries in mathematical sciences using Large Language Models
entry.summary: In a paper published in Nature, we introduce FunSearch, a method for searching for “functions” written in computer code, and find new solutions in mathematics and computer science. FunSearch works by pairing a pre-trained LLM, whose goal is to provide creative solutions in the form of computer code, with an automated “evaluator”, which guards against hallucinations and incorrect ideas. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Google DeepMind at NeurIPS 2023
entry.summary: The Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) is the largest artificial intelligence (AI) conference in the world. NeurIPS 2023 will be taking place December 10-16 in New Orleans, USA.Teams from across Google DeepMind are presenting more than 150 papers at the main conference and workshops. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Introducing Gemini: our largest and most capable AI model
entry.summary: Making AI more helpful for everyone | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Millions of new materials discovered with deep learning
entry.summary: We share the discovery of 2.2 million new crystals – equivalent to nearly 800 years’ worth of knowledge. We introduce Graph Networks for Materials Exploration (GNoME), our new deep learning tool that dramatically increases the speed and efficiency of discovery by predicting the stability of new materials. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Transforming the future of music creation
entry.summary: Announcing our most advanced music generation model and two new AI experiments, designed to open a new playground for creativity | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Empowering the next generation for an AI-enabled world
entry.summary: Experience AI's course and resources are expanding on a global scale | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: GraphCast: AI model for faster and more accurate global weather forecasting
entry.summary: We introduce GraphCast, a state-of-the-art AI model able to make medium-range weather forecasts with unprecedented accuracy | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: A glimpse of the next generation of AlphaFold
entry.summary: Progress update: Our latest AlphaFold model shows significantly improved accuracy and expands coverage beyond proteins to other biological molecules, including ligands. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Evaluating social and ethical risks from generative AI
entry.summary: Introducing a context-based framework for comprehensively evaluating the social and ethical risks of AI systems | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Scaling up learning across many different robot types
entry.summary: Robots are great specialists, but poor generalists. Typically, you have to train a model for each task, robot, and environment. Changing a single variable often requires starting from scratch. But what if we could combine the knowledge across robotics and create a way to train a general-purpose robot? | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases
entry.summary: New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Identifying AI-generated images with SynthID
entry.summary: New tool helps watermark and identify synthetic images created by Imagen | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: RT-2: New model translates vision and language into action
entry.summary: Robotic Transformer 2 (RT-2) is a novel vision-language-action (VLA) model that learns from both web and robotics data, and translates this knowledge into generalised instructions for robotic control. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Using AI to fight climate change
entry.summary: AI is a powerful technology that will transform our future, so how can we best apply it to help combat climate change and find sustainable solutions? | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Google DeepMind’s latest research at ICML 2023
entry.summary: Exploring AI safety, adaptability, and efficiency for the real world | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Developing reliable AI tools for healthcare
entry.summary: We’ve published our joint paper with Google Research in Nature Medicine, which proposes CoDoC (Complementarity-driven Deferral-to-Clinical Workflow), an AI system that learns when to rely on predictive AI tools or defer to a clinician for the most accurate interpretation of medical images. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Exploring institutions for global AI governance
entry.summary: New white paper investigates models and functions of international institutions that could help manage opportunities and mitigate risks of advanced AI. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: RoboCat: A self-improving robotic agent
entry.summary: Robots are quickly becoming part of our everyday lives, but they’re often only programmed to perform specific tasks well. While harnessing recent advances in AI could lead to robots that could help in many more ways, progress in building general-purpose robots is slower in part because of the time needed to collect real-world training data. Our latest paper introduces a self-improving AI agent for robotics, RoboCat, that learns to perform a variety of tasks across different arms, and then self-generates new training data to improve its technique. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: YouTube: Enhancing the user experience
entry.summary: It’s all about using our technology and research to help enrich people’s lives. Like YouTube — and its mission to give everyone a voice and show them the world. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Google Cloud: Driving digital transformation
entry.summary: Google Cloud empowers organizations to digitally transform themselves into smarter businesses. It offers cloud computing, data analytics, and the latest artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning tools. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: MuZero, AlphaZero, and AlphaDev: Optimizing computer systems
entry.summary: How MuZero, AlphaZero, and AlphaDev are optimizing the computing ecosystem that powers our world of devices. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AlphaDev discovers faster sorting algorithms
entry.summary: New algorithms will transform the foundations of computing | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: An early warning system for novel AI risks
entry.summary: New research proposes a framework for evaluating general-purpose models against novel threats | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: DeepMind’s latest research at ICLR 2023
entry.summary: Next week marks the start of the 11th International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR), taking place 1-5 May in Kigali, Rwanda. This will be the first major artificial intelligence (AI) conference to be hosted in Africa and the first in-person event since the start of the pandemic. Researchers from around the world will gather to share their cutting-edge work in deep learning spanning the fields of AI, statistics and data science, and applications including machine vision, gaming and robotics. We’re proud to support the conference as a Diamond sponsor and DEI champion. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: How can we build human values into AI?
entry.summary: Drawing from philosophy to identify fair principles for ethical AI... | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Announcing Google DeepMind
entry.summary: DeepMind and the Brain team from Google Research will join forces to accelerate progress towards a world in which AI helps solve the biggest challenges facing humanity. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: Competitive programming with AlphaCode
entry.summary: Solving novel problems and setting a new milestone in competitive programming. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)

entry.title: AI for the board game Diplomacy
entry.summary: Successful communication and cooperation have been crucial for helping societies advance throughout history. The closed environments of board games can serve as a sandbox for modelling and investigating interaction and communication – and we can learn a lot from playing them. In our recent paper, published today in Nature Communications, we show how artificial agents can use communication to better cooperate in the board game Diplomacy, a vibrant domain in artificial intelligence (AI) research, known for its focus on alliance building. | Organization: Google | Source: Deepmind (news)
